channel.title: 317 full screen please read and try to help out a new member of the board
channel.description: I was going to resize my client to fullscreen, since my client was nonrefactored, I looked in another tutorial and I had to download some client hax folder I added that to my client files then I compiled it. I looked at the rest of the tutorial and It was extremely vague about what exactly I'm suppose to do with it, I was wondering if you more experienced coders could give a new comer a hand =]
